publication.title: Experiences with Honeypot Systems: Development, Deployment, and Analysis
publication.jconf: Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences
publication.keyword: Early Warning System;Insider Attack;Network Services;Operating System;Production System;Software Process;System Development;
publication.abstract: This paper presents a summary of university re- search performed on honeypot techniques and summarizes the results Honeypots are computing resources that serve no other purpose on a network than to be a target for attackers, and log data about the attacks. Low-interaction and high-interaction honeypots were implemented and deployed on a university network, and data was logged and analyzed

publication.title: Using Search Engines to Acquire Network Forensic Evidence
